title: Growth Spurts Explained
description: A short lesson to help you apply Growth Spurts Explained.

hook.text: A child's pants fit on Monday. By Friday, her ankles are showing.

buildup.text: Children don't grow steadily â€” they grow in sudden bursts separated by plateaus.

discovery.text: Growth hormone releases mostly during deep sleep, which is why growing kids sleep so much.

twist.text: Bones grow faster than muscles during spurts, causing the clumsiness parents notice.

climax.text: The biggest growth spurts happen in infancy and again in early puberty.
